transArray.content: The hotel is at the back end of Qianmen Pedestrian Street. It is very close to Zhushikou Subway Station. Take a walk to Tiananmen Square for more than half an hour. You can also take a bus directly to Qianmen. The room is really small but the layout is very reasonable. The bed is very comfortable and the hot water is good The hotels I have stayed in are very good and fit their concept that the hotel is a place to sleep and bathe
